description: This file contains the main activity class for an Android application, managing navigation between home, favorites, and cart screens, handling UI updates, theme application, and exposing some public methods.

classes.name: MainActivity
classes.description: Main activity handling navigation, theme, and UI interactions for the app.

methods.name: onCreate
methods.description: Initializes repositories, theme, view models, navigation, and default fragments.

methods.name: navigateHome
methods.description: Replaces the fragment container with the HomeFragment.

methods.name: navigateFavorites
methods.description: Replaces the fragment container with the FavoritesFragment.

methods.name: navigateCart
methods.description: Replaces the fragment container with the CartFragment.

methods.name: applyThemeMode
methods.description: Applies the theme based on user preferences.

methods.name: openMenu
methods.description: Public method to navigate to the MenuFragment for a specific restaurant.

methods.name: openCartTab
methods.description: Public method to switch to the cart tab programmatically.
